summary: DT: ON AUGUST 15, 2005 THE DRIVER'S DOOR WHERE THE LEVER IS  HAS THREE BOLTS TO IT AND IT BROKE. INSIDE OF THE PANEL OF THE DOOR SOMETHING BROKE, AND IT WILL NOT LET IT TO BE  SHUT BECAUSE OF THE PANEL. THE  SENSOR LIGHT FOR DOOR CAME ON AND SHOWED THAT THE DOOR WAS NOT SHUT.  THE CONSUMER  WENT AROUND AT RIGHT CURVE AND THE DOOR CAME OPEN. COULD NOT GET THE DOOR TO SHUT. HELD IT  UNTIL THE CONSUMER  GOT HOME. WASHERS  WERE HOLDING THE DOOR TOGETHER. ALSO,  HAS THE BACK DOORS LOCKED TO MAKE SURE THAT IT DID NOT HAPPEN TO THE REAR DOORS. CONTACTED THE DEALER, AND THEY WERE GOING TO CHARGE THE CONSUMER 1500.00 TO FIX  IT.  *AK
